main event: A UFO sighting reported on 12 July 1965 in Greenville, Ohio, where the object was described as cone-shaped and similar to a satellite, flashing and moving steadily.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 5-7 minutes.,Witnesses concluded that the object was probably a satellite.,The object exhibited steady motion with no irregular motion characteristics.,The sighting occurred at night.,The witness noted that the object appeared reddish in color.
witness description: A 23 year old male, additional details redacted.
